New Records: Tarik Skubal recorded his 200th strikeout of the season
Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal pitched a career-high eight innings and struck out 8 batters
Riley Greene made a great defensive play to throw out Romy Gonzalez at second base
Jake Rogers made a diving stop to throw out Ceddanne Rafaela by two steps in the third inning
Trey Sweeney and Zach McKinstry turned an improbable double play on a high-chopper by Triston Casas in the fifth
Post-Match Reflections: Tarik Skubal said the team should bring back the 1984 team for every game
Manager AJ Hinch praised Skubal's efficiency and dominance
Spencer Torkelson commended Skubal's conviction and confidence in his pitches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather or field conditions affecting the match
The Tigers scored their two runs in the span of three hitters in the second inning
The game was part of the 40th anniversary celebration of the 1984 World Series championship
